Item ID12291

Mithril kiteshield (t) is a part of mithril trimmed armour and a reward from medium Treasure Trails. It has the same stats as a normal Mithril kiteshield, and requires level 20 Defence to wear. This item cannot be made via the Smithing skill.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-8-3
 Defence bonuses
+18+22+20-1+20

The shield's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -2 to -3.

[[File:Mithril kiteshield (t) detail.png|left|150px]]
'''Mithril kiteshield (t)''' is a part of [[mithril trimmed armour]] and a reward from [[Clue scroll (medium)|medium]] [[Treasure Trails]]. It has the same stats as a normal [[Mithril kiteshield]], and requires level 20 [[Defence]] to wear. This item '''cannot''' be made via the [[Smithing]] skill.
